text: is a Japanese women's football team which plays in Nadeshiko League. ==Club name== *Osaka-Takatsuki Ladies SC : 1990 *Matsushita Electric Ladies SC Bambina : 1991 - 1994 *Matsushita Electric Panasonic Bambina : 1995 - 1999 *Speranza FC Takatsuki : 2000 - 2011 *Speranza FC Osaka-Takatsuki : 2012 – 2015 *Konomiya Speranza Osaka-Takatsuki : 2016 – 2018 *Speranza Osaka- Takatsuki : 2019 – Present ==Results== Season Domestic League National Cup League Cup League Level Place Tms. Nadeshiko Div.2 Challenge (West) Group Stage / Div.2 ==Honors== ===Domestic competitions=== *Nadeshiko League Division 1 **Champions (1) : 1994 *Nadeshiko League Cup **Runners-up (1) : 1998 ==Other websites== Category:1990 establishments in Japan Category:Football clubs in Osaka
title: Speranza Osaka-Takatsuki
